title: Edelweiss Alternatives' asset management arm raises Rs 8,000 cr for infra fund
description: Edelweiss Alternatives manages several funds spanning performing credit (corporate and real estate), special situations and real assets (infrastructure yield and commercial real estate), with total assets under management of about $6.3 billion.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
